      • canRewardPlayer

        public boolean canRewardPlayer(RewardProvider provider,
                      org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                      int count)
        Determines whether or not a player can be rewarded (or penalized) the given number of times.
        Parameters:
        provider - - reward provider.
        player - - the player to test.
        count - - number of times to reward this action.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the action can be rewarded that number of times, FALSE otherwise.

      • rewardPlayer

        public int rewardPlayer(RewardProvider provider,
               java.util.Random rnd,
               org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Rewards or penalizes a player with the given amount of resources.
        Parameters:
        provider - - reward provider that determines specifically how to reward players.
        rnd - - random number generator.
        player - - the player to reward.
        Returns:
        The amount of total resources that were given.

      • rewardPlayer

        public int rewardPlayer(RewardProvider provider,
               java.util.Random rnd,
               org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
               int count)
        Rewards or penalizes a player with the given amount of resources.
        Parameters:
        provider - - reward provider that determines specifically how to reward players.
        rnd - - random number generator.
        player - - the player to reward.
        count - - the number of times to give this resource.
        Returns:
        The amount of total resources that were given.

      • rewardPlayer

        public int rewardPlayer(RewardProvider provider,
               java.util.Random rnd,
               org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
               org.bukkit.Location point)
        Rewards or penalizes a given player with resources at a given location.
        Parameters:
        provider - - reward provider that determines specifically how to reward players.
        rnd - - random number generator.
        player - - the player to reward.
        point - - the location to place the reward, if relevant.
        Returns:
        The amount of total resources that were given.

      • rewardAnyone

        public int rewardAnyone(RewardProvider provider,
               java.util.Random rnd,
               org.bukkit.World world,
               org.bukkit.Location point)
        Spawns resources at the given location.
        Parameters:
        provider - - reward provider that determines specifically how to award resources.
        rnd - - random number generator.
        world - - the world where the resources should be spawned.
        point - - the location to place the reward.
        Returns:
        The amount of total resources that were given.
